scripts.build-rc: mkdir "out/2021" && cp -R img "out/2021" && ecmarkup --verbose spec/index.html out/2021/index.html --css out/2021/ecmarkup.css --js out/2021/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build-master: mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --lint-spec --verbose spec/index.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
scripts.prebuild-only: npm run clean && mkdir out && cp -R img out
